# stroke(lineWidth:)

**Instance Method**

Applies the given stoke drawn map overlays using the line width you specify.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency func stroke(lineWidth: CGFloat = 1) -> some MapContent

```

## Parameters

- **lineWidth**: The line width to draw the stroke with.

## Return Value

Returns [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MapContent] with overlays drawn with `lineWidth` you specified.

## Setting stroke properties

- **stroke(_:lineWidth:)**: Applies the given shape style to drawn map overlays using the line width you specify.
- **stroke(_:style:)**: Applies the given shape style to drawn map overlays using the stroke style you specify.
- **strokeStyle(style:)**: Applies the given stroke style to drawn map overlays.
